H0.text: What would you find on Carmen Miranda's hat. Flowers

H1.text: What would you find on Carmen Miranda's hat. Feathers

H2.text: What would you find on Carmen Miranda's hat. Bows

H3.text: What would you find on Carmen Miranda's hat. Friut

A4.text: her enormous, fruit-laden hats were iconic visuals recognized worldwide

A5.text: contrary to popular belief, they were never made from real fruit
